items.title: Bedside Table African Cherry
items.description: The Bedside Table in African Cherry is a stylish and functional addition to your bedroom, providing convenient storage space and a touch of elegance.

items.title: Orian Coffee Table
items.description: The Orion Coffee Table features a minimalist design with a glass top and sleek metal legs. Its spacious surface is perfect for holding books, magazines, and decorative items, while the tempered glass adds a touch of elegance. The sturdy metal frame ensures durability and stability, making it a stylish and practical addition to any living room.

items.title: Channel Dining Set

items.title: Paris Kad Dining Set
items.description: the Paris Kad Dining Set, a luxurious addition to any dining room or kitchen. Designed with impeccable style and superior craftsmanship, this dining set offers a perfect blend of elegance and functionality.

items.title: Zen Console Table
items.description: The Zen Console Table offers a simple, elegant design with a smooth wooden surface and clean lines. Ideal for entryways and hallways, this table provides a perfect spot for displaying photos, vases, or other decorative items. The solid wood construction ensures durability, while the minimalist design complements any decor style
